name: UpdateTaxObject
description:
Update properties of a tax object in HubSpot CRM.

This tool updates specified properties of a tax object in HubSpot CRM using its ID or a unique property value. It's used to perform partial updates where only certain fields need modification. Fields to be updated are specified in the request, and read-only or non-existent fields will cause errors. To clear a property, pass an empty string.

parameters.name: tax_object_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the tax object. Use the internal `taxId` by default or provide a unique property value specified by the `idProperty`.

parameters.name: tax_object_properties
parameters.description: JSON object containing key-value pairs of properties to update. Read-only or non-existent fields will cause errors. Empty strings can clear values.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: The name of a property uniquely identifying this tax object. Used instead of `taxId` if specified.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
